attributes.action: Cap prices for eletricity for home users
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have started this e-petition for the PM to cap the prices of eletricity to the home users we all know how expencive it is to use, but its getting beyond a joke now, how many people are going to be cold and die because they are worried about the cost of power so they dont use it and its only going to get worse over the years to come, i could go on and on but we are not daft we all know wots going on, how many folk are going to go cold and die so the power companys can make big profits. plz sign this e-petition
